title: Yemen’s Houthis undeterred by U.S. campaign to halt Red Sea attacks
content: Recent attacks by Houthi fighters on commercial ships in the Red Sea have underscored the group’s ability to pose a sustained threat.
summary: Recent attacks by Houthi fighters on commercial ships in the Red Sea have underscored the group’s ability to pose a sustained threat.

title: Israeli airstrikes kill dozens in Gaza City, authorities say
content: Israeli strikes killed 38 people in four neighborhoods Saturday, the Gaza civil defense force said. The military said it struck Hamas infrastructure in the city.
summary: Israeli strikes killed 38 people in four neighborhoods Saturday, the Gaza civil defense force said. The military said it struck Hamas infrastructure in the city.

title: Taylor Swift fever sweeps London, reaches royal family
content: Taylor Swift posed for a selfie with Prince William and his eldest children, Princess Charlotte and Prince George, as the star kicked off concerts in London.
summary: Taylor Swift posed for a selfie with Prince William and his eldest children, Princess Charlotte and Prince George, as the star kicked off concerts in London.

title: A European wild cat was nearly extinct. Now, it is making a comeback.
content: The Iberian lynx is no longer classified as endangered, with one group calling it the “greatest recovery of a cat species ever achieved through conservation.”
summary: The Iberian lynx is no longer classified as endangered, with one group calling it the “greatest recovery of a cat species ever achieved through conservation.”

title: French election this month rattles financial markets as debt woes mount
content: Markets were rattled by Macron’s election gamble, which followed an unexpectedly strong showing by the far-right National Rally in June 9 balloting for the European Parliament.
summary: Markets were rattled by Macron’s election gamble, which followed an unexpectedly strong showing by the far-right National Rally in June 9 balloting for the European Parliament.

title: Weapons of choice in China’s territorial disputes? Axes, knives, ‘jostling.’
content: Experts say that China’s use of simple weapons rather than firearms has been a tactical choice, but it may not always prevent escalation.
summary: Experts say that China’s use of simple weapons rather than firearms has been a tactical choice, but it may not always prevent escalation.

title: Russia and North Korea’s military deal formalizes a bustling arms trade
content: Russian trade data shows how cash-strapped Pyongyang is transporting shipping containers to munitions-hungry Moscow to help it sustain its war against Ukraine.
summary: Russian trade data shows how cash-strapped Pyongyang is transporting shipping containers to munitions-hungry Moscow to help it sustain its war against Ukraine.

title: State Dept. expert on Israeli-Palestinian affairs resigns amid Gaza crisis
content: Andrew Miller, a top State Department official, becomes the most senior U.S. official to resign whose portfolio focused on Israeli-Palestinian issues.
summary: Andrew Miller, a top State Department official, becomes the most senior U.S. official to resign whose portfolio focused on Israeli-Palestinian issues.

title: In photos: Scenes from the extreme hot weather around the world
content: The National Weather Service issued a heat watch for parts of the United States, predicting a “prolonged period of dangerously hot conditions.”
summary: The National Weather Service issued a heat watch for parts of the United States, predicting a “prolonged period of dangerously hot conditions.”

title: Beleaguered aid pier functional again in Gaza; Netanyahu slams U.S.
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu blasts Washington over slow weapons deliveries, drawing a puzzled response from U.S. officials.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu blasts Washington over slow weapons deliveries, drawing a puzzled response from U.S. officials.

title: U.S. restrictions put key Russian air bases out of firing range, officials say
content: Letting Ukraine hit targets in Russia with U.S. weapons has reduced missile attacks on Kharkiv but not stopped planes that drop deadly glide bombs.
summary: Letting Ukraine hit targets in Russia with U.S. weapons has reduced missile attacks on Kharkiv but not stopped planes that drop deadly glide bombs.

title: China cultivated high-rolling crime families before turning on them
content: A Post investigation found that criminal networks in Myanmar enjoyed the protection of Chinese officials as well as the military government in Myanmar.
summary: A Post investigation found that criminal networks in Myanmar enjoyed the protection of Chinese officials as well as the military government in Myanmar.

title: The many battles of Benjamin Netanyahu
content: The consummate political survivor, Benjamin Netanyahu is now facing fights on many fronts with groups that he once counted on as allies.
summary: The consummate political survivor, Benjamin Netanyahu is now facing fights on many fronts with groups that he once counted on as allies.

title: As climate change imperils Taliban’s shift from opium, impact could be felt worldwide
content: Prolonged droughts attributed to climate change are making it hard for Afghans to grow other field crops and fruits, but hardy opium poppies can still thrive.
summary: Prolonged droughts attributed to climate change are making it hard for Afghans to grow other field crops and fruits, but hardy opium poppies can still thrive.

title: Israel’s Netanyahu is at war with almost everyone
content: The Israeli leader is locked in battle — many battles.
summary: The Israeli leader is locked in battle — many battles.

title: U.S. will boost Ukraine’s air defense by pausing exports to allies
content: The Patriot and NASAMS systems are the two most sophisticated air defense munitions the West has provided to Ukraine.
summary: The Patriot and NASAMS systems are the two most sophisticated air defense munitions the West has provided to Ukraine.
